SHR ExposureReasonVS ValueSet

The reason that an exposure occurred.

name: SHR ExposureReasonVS ValueSet
title: SHR ExposureReasonVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: The reason that an exposure occurred.

concept.display: The subject voluntarily subjects him or herself to the exposure, for example, smoking or using a drug recreationally.
The subject is addicted to the substance.
The subject takes a non-prescription substance to address health issues or for prevention, e.g. herbal remedy for depression.
The exposure occurred or occurs involuntarily, e.g., exposure to second-hand smoke.
The exposure as a result of an accident.
